marklogic.body: I have several questions for you RID. Â  Do you even read what you post and did Masters even mention â€œGlobal warmingâ€ or global in your post? The Western U.S. trough has cut into a "cut-Off low" that is slowly drifting eastwards Â  What do you think temps are doing on the other side of that jet stream in Alaska and the NW coast?
